*[Bug 18756] New: missing whitespace befor key command*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18756>

            Bug ID: 18756
           Summary: missing whitespace befor key command
           Product: R

          Hardware: Other
                OS: Linux
            Status: UNCONFIRMED
          Severity: normal
          Priority: P5
         Component: Documentation
          Assignee: <mailto:R-core@R-project.org|R-core@R-project.org>
          Reporter: <mailto:tim.taylor@hiddenelephants.co.uk|tim.taylor@hiddenelephants.co.uk>

Created attachment 3367
  --> <https://bugs.r-project.org/attachment.cgi?id=3367&action=edit>
R-exts.texi whitespace patch

The attached patch adds some white space to the final bullet point entry at
<https://cran.r-project.org/doc/manuals/r-devel/R-exts.html#Finding-entry-points-in-dynamically-loaded-code>.

That said, as this is the only use of the @key{} command in R-exts.texi, would
it be preferable to remove this single usage instead?
